content.text:
Recent completed items in the elizaOS/eliza repository include several features, bugfixes, and other improvements:

Feature additions include a Project TEE Starter Template (#4774), improved logging (#4784), production test CLI with cron workflows (#4797), CLI publish command updates (#4795), npm publishing integration to the default elizaOS publish workflow (#4793), CLI tests with plugin dependencies and overhauled plugin registration (#4789), and improved typing (#4787).

Bugfixes include cleanup of package.json for the monorepo (#4733), adding missing agentId to create room functionality (#4796), updates to registry publishing logic and package naming (#4792), removal of unneeded parenthesis in CLI publish command (#4790), and bootstrap plugin default fixes (#4788).

Documentation was updated for publish workflow documentation related to npm integration (#4794).

Other changes include removal of unused methods from the database adapter (#4781), updates to README_IND.md (#4780), and consolidation of registry URLs to elizaOS plugins (#4791).

Several pull requests have been submitted to the elizaOS/eliza repository:

1. PR #4801 by HarshModi2005 implements the Polygon zkEVM plugin and includes test cleanup.

2. PR #4789 by lalalune adds CLI tests, implements plugin dependencies, and overhauls the plugin registration system.

3. PR #4795 by yungalgo adds a CLI publish command.

4. PR #4733 by ChristopherTrimboli fixes and cleans up the package.json configuration for the monorepo structure.

From May 27 to May 28, 2025, the GitHub repository elizaos/eliza saw significant activity with 17 new pull requests, all of which were merged. The repository had no new issues reported during this period. There were 9 active contributors working on the project during this timeframe.
The source provides information about the top contributors for the elizaOS/eliza repository. However, no specific details about the contributors are provided in the given text.
